snippet: A Walmart employee sued the retailer on Tuesday, saying its previous policy of denying health insurance to the spouses of gay employees violated gender discrimination laws.
abstract: Walmart employee Jackie Cote sues retailer, saying its policy of denying health insurance to spouses of gay employees violates gender discrimination laws; Cote's spouse is terminally ill.
lead_paragraph: A Walmart employee sued the retailer on Tuesday, saying its previous policy of denying health insurance to the spouses of gay employees violated gender discrimination laws.

headline.main: Gay Spouse Sues Walmart Over Older Health Policy
headline.print_headline: Gay Spouse Sues Walmart Over Older Health Policy

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
